Message:
so I’ll buy her time.
“You go get a head start,” I say...

...but Sol stares at me
with eyes full of worry.

“I’m not a witch,
so they won’t capture me.

Come on, depend on your
big sister from time to time.”

Hesitantly, Sol nodded and
slipped out through the back.
I watched her go, and shut the door.

I hope she didn’t notice
my shaking body.

I think my smile was
convincing enough at least...

Before long, the Inquisition
came to our house.

I mustered up all my courage
and stood my ground.
